```python rotate_proxies.py
from notte_sdk import NotteClient
from notte_sdk.types import NotteProxy, ProxyGeolocation

client = NotteClient()

# Session 1 with US proxy
with client.Session(proxies=[NotteProxy(geolocation=ProxyGeolocation(country="US"))]) as session:
    # automation
    pass

# Session 2 with UK proxy
with client.Session(proxies=[NotteProxy(geolocation=ProxyGeolocation(country="GB"))]) as session:
    # automation
    pass
```
